mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document (folder_id, title, memo, s3_key, save_at) VALUES (#{folderId}, #{title}, #{memo}, #{s3Key}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT title, memo, save_at, s3_key FROM document d JOIN folder f ON f.id = d.folder_id JOIN user u ON u.id = f.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND d.id = #{documentId};
